name: GCControllerButtonInput
desc: A control element that represents a button touch or press.

items.name: var isTouched: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the user is touching the button.

items.name: var isPressed: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the user is pressing the button.

items.name: var value: Float
items.desc: The level of pressure the user is applying to the button.

items.name: var touchedChangedHandler: GCControllerButtonTouchedChangedHandler?
items.desc: The block that the element calls when the user touches the button.

items.name: typealias GCControllerButtonTouchedChangedHandler
items.desc: The signature for the block that executes when the user touches the button if the controller supports that feature.

items.name: var pressedChangedHandler: GCControllerButtonValueChangedHandler?
items.desc: The block that the element calls when the user presses or releases the button.

items.name: var valueChangedHandler: GCControllerButtonValueChangedHandler?
items.desc: The block that the element calls when the user changes the level of pressure on the button.
